attributes.action: Save Rhondda Fach Sport centre swimming pool
attributes.additional_details:
The pool is used regularly by all ages swimming lessons take place there two times a week they so popular there is a waiting list ( fantastic lessons) 

The pool could be used a lot more but with the slide being closed that does not help and with the sport centre closing half day some days or rent opening at 4 that obviously  going to effect the usage of the pool.

Why should we lose our pool we got nothing in our community now 

Please try and help save the pool!!!
attributes.background: The council have proposed to close the pool in Rhondda Fach sport centre due to low usage and make the area in to a 3g pitch or a fitness suite  ( another one)

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
